H0.text: Which famous painter's surname was Harmenzoon van Rijn which translated as son of Harmen, of the Rhine. Rembrandt

H1.text: Which famous painter's surname was Harmenzoon van Rijn which translated as son of Harmen, of the Rhine. Frans Hals

H2.text: Which famous painter's surname was Harmenzoon van Rijn which translated as son of Harmen, of the Rhine. Johannes Vermeer

H3.text: Which famous painter's surname was Harmenzoon van Rijn which translated as son of Harmen, of the Rhine. Van Rejn

A4.text: Rembrandt Harmenszoon van Rijn was born on 15 July 1606 in Leiden, Netherlands.

A5.text: The name 'van Rijn' indicates that Rembrandt's family lived near the Rhine.
